entities.name: child
entities.description: The child is the main subject of the story, introduced as someone who would be affected by the movement of the wand.

entities.name: mother
entities.description: The mother is the parent of the child and is mentioned as a target for the child's reach.

entities.name: wand
entities.description: The wand is an object that has the power to affect the child's movement.

entities.name: street
entities.description: The street is a location where the character moves and is described as darker.

relationships.description: The child's movement is directed towards reaching their mother, but this action is prevented by the wand.
The character moves through a new and darker street as they head to their destination.
